text: Carroll M. Ebright (March 20, 1894 - November 1979), sometimes known as Ky Ebright was a coach for the University of California, Berkeley crew team. He is the only man to coach three Olympic gold medal winning eight oared boats. Ky Ebright died in Berkeley, California at the age of 85. == Wins == === Olympic wins === * 1928 Summer Olympics - Gold Medal * 1932 Summer Olympics - Gold Medal * 1948 Summer Olympics - Gold Medal === IRA Championships === *1928 *1932 *1934 *1935 *1939 *1949 ==References== == Other websites == * Rowing Hall of Fame Link * IRA Championships Link * History Cal Crew Category:1894 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States
title: Ky Ebright
